characters.name: Wayne the Archivist of Lies
characters.backstory: A cunning wizard with a penchant for deception and a mysterious past. Wayne seeks knowledge at any cost, often bending the truth to serve his purposes.
characters.personality: Witty, sarcastic, and morally ambiguous. Wayne is known for his quick thinking and silver tongue.

characters.name: Winnifred 'Fred' Blodbane
characters.backstory: A fierce warrior with a heart of gold. Fred left her tribe to forge her own path and prove her worth beyond her lineage.
characters.personality: Brave, loyal, and fiercely protective of her friends. Quick to anger but quicker to forgive.

characters.name: Carine Sol
characters.backstory: A noble paladin sworn to protect the innocent and uphold justice. Despite her infernal heritage, Carine fights tirelessly against evil.
characters.personality: Honorable, compassionate, and driven by a strong moral compass.

characters.name: Erys Leandorian
characters.backstory: A skilled tracker and archer from the ancient forests of Aneria. Erys left his home to uncover the truth about a growing darkness.
characters.personality: Calm, observant, and deeply connected to nature.
